event_food_mold.name: Moldy Supplies
event_food_mold.description: After a long journey, part of your food has spoiled.

event_lucky_find_fuel.name: Lucky Fuel Find
event_lucky_find_fuel.description: You stumble upon an abandoned supply cart and recover some fuel.

event_rat_infestation.name: Rat Infestation
event_rat_infestation.description: Rats have eaten part of your food reserves.

event_unstable_crate.name: Unstable Crate
event_unstable_crate.description: A poorly secured crate collapses, damaging some of your metal cargo.

event_wandering_merchant.name: Wandering Merchant
event_wandering_merchant.description: A travelling merchant gifts you a rare relic as a token of goodwill.

event_fuel_leak.name: Fuel Leak
event_fuel_leak.description: A small leak in your tank causes you to lose some fuel.

event_gem_fragment_found.name: Gem Fragment
event_gem_fragment_found.description: You discover a small gem fragment hidden under old debris.

event_spilled_food.name: Spilled Rations
event_spilled_food.description: A sudden jolt causes some of your food crates to fall and break open.

event_stolen_by_thief.name: Thief in the Night
event_stolen_by_thief.description: A thief sneaks into your camp and steals valuable supplies.

event_small_meteorite.name: Small Meteorite
event_small_meteorite.description: A small meteorite hits near your camp — inside the crater you find rare minerals.

event_spooked_animals.name: Spooked Animals
event_spooked_animals.description: Your pack animals panic, causing you to lose some supplies.

event_hidden_cache.name: Hidden Cache
event_hidden_cache.description: You uncover a hidden cache left by previous travelers.

event_lucky_trader_encounter.name: Lucky Trader Encounter
event_lucky_trader_encounter.description: You meet a friendly trader who gifts you a small bundle of supplies.

event_sandstorm_damage.name: Sandstorm Damage
event_sandstorm_damage.description: A sudden sandstorm damages part of your metal cargo.
